text: Hagi ana'ma hutenka ainire fraipani erinka kagrane ana rankumamofo amu'nompinena antegeno ainire keginagna huno me'nena kavugosa anantega huntenegeno, ha' vahe'mo'zama rankuma'ma avazagi kagine'zama hankaveti'za ha'ma hunezmanta zankna hino. Hagi e'i ana maka zama tro'ma hanana zamo'a, Israeli vahe'mo'zama nege'za kvama hanaza zamofo avame'za megahie.
